mapper.sql: node_id, node_name, remark, node_type, version, teller, org
mapper.select:
select count(1) from conf_node_info where 1=1
and t.nodeName like '%#{nodeName}%'
and t.nodeType like '%#{nodeType}%'
mapper.insert: insert into conf_node_info (node_id, node_name, remark, node_type, version, teller, org) values (#{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into conf_node_info
node_id,

version,

org,

mapper.update:
update conf_node_info
node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
node_type = #{nodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teller = #{teller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
